Function Summary for STIXbox

Contents
A rudimentary statistics toolbox.

bincoef
Binomial coefficients

ciquant
Nonparametric confidence interval for quantile

cmpmod
Compare linear submodel versus larger one

datas1
Consumption Function

datas10
Cost-of-Living Data

datas11
Demographic Data

datas2
Salary Survey Data

datas4
Health Club Data

datas5
Brain and Body Weight Data

datas6
Cement Data

datas7
Colon Cancer Data

datas8
Growth Data

dbeta
The beta density function

dbinom
The binomial probability function

dchisq
The chisquare density function

df
The F density function (or Fisher-Snedecor density function)

dgamma
The gamma density function

dhypg
The hypergeometric probability function

dnorm
The normal density function

dt
The student t density function

getdata
Famous datasets.

histo
Plot a histogram

identify
Identify points on a plot by clicking with the mouse.

kstwo
Kolmogorov-Smirnov statistic from two samples

linreg
Linear or polynomial regression

lodds
Log odds function.

loddsinv
Compute the inverse of log odds.

logitfit
Fit a logistic regression model.

lsfit
Fit a multiple regression normal model.

lsselect
Select a predictor subset for regression

pairs
Pairwise scatter plots.

pbeta
The beta distribution function

pbinom
The binomial cumulative probability function

pchisq
The chisquare distribution function

pf
The F (or Fisher-Snedecor) cumulative distribution function

pgamma
The gamma cumulative distribution function

phypg
The hypergeometric cumulative probability function

pks
Kolmogorov Smirnov distribution function

plotsym
Plot with symbols

pnorm
The normal distribution function

pt
The Student t cumulative distribution function

qbeta
The beta inverse distribution function

qbinom
The binomial inverse cdf

qchisq
The chisquare inverse distribution function

qf
The F (or Fisher-Snedecor) inverse distribution function

qgamma
The gamma inverse distribution function

qhypg
The hypergeometric inverse cdf

qnorm
The normal inverse distribution function

qqnorm
Normal probability paper

qqplot
Plot empirical quantile vs empirical quantile

qt
The student t inverse distribution function

quantile
Empirical quantile (percentile).

rbeta
Random numbers from the beta distribution (inversion method)

rbinom
Random numbers from the binomial distribution (inversion method)

rboot
Simulate a bootstrap resample from a sample.

rchisq
Random numbers from the chisquare distribution

rexpweib
Random numbers from the exponential or weibull distributions

rf
Random numbers from the F distribution (inversion method)

rgamma
Random numbers from the gamma distribution (inversion method)

rgeom
Random numbers from the geometric distribution

rhypg
Random numbers from the hypergeometric distribution

rjbinom
Random numbers from the binomial distribution (reject method)

rjgamma
Generates gamma random deviates.

rjpoiss
Random numbers from the poisson distribution (reject method)

rnorm
Normal random numbers

rpoiss
Random numbers from the poisson distribution (renewal method)

rt
Random numbers from the student t distribution (inversion method)

stixdemo
STIXDEMO Demonstrate various stixbox routines.

test1n
Tests and confidence intervals based on a normal sample

test2n
Tests and confidence intervals based on two normal samples
